short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple chrome extenstion to add draft functionality to codebase.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Codebase Drafts is a simple Chrome extension that adds draft functionality to Codebase. It auto-saves a comment on a project ticket page as draft and multiple drafts for new tickets that have not been submitted. It also comes with live updates of new project ticket comments posted by other users. It can be used on multiple projects within multiple companies at the same time.
